website_summaries.verdict: An antiperspirant that has been shown to safely and effectively treat hyperhidrosis and excessive sweating.
pros: Helps reduce excessive perspiration and underarm wetness and eliminate embarrassing sweat marks
A single bottle is designed to last up to two months
Does not require pads to apply the antiperspirant to the skin
cons: May cause skin irritation or itching if the antiperspirant is not applied properly

customer_reviews.title: Harry Potter gets his PhD
customer_reviews.text: Listen, I’m sure you’ve used “prescription” stuff already if you’re considering this magical juice. Let me tell you what...whatever magical wizard that came up with this stuff must have a secondary PhD in otherdimensional chemestry, because that’s the only explanation as to where the sweat goes...another dimension. Don’t believe me? Check out my pics...no they’re not inappropriate, but they are very revealing. Looks like wizardry chemestry to me. That’s after 2 hours of pickup ball and 3 days after the last time I applied the magic potion that is ZeroSweat
customer_reviews.author: Nate

customer_reviews.title: Blow drying after application really helps the itchiness!
customer_reviews.text: Normally I don't take the time to write reviews because I don't have a lot of specifics to say; however, I felt that people could benefit from this one. This stuff definitely makes me itchy but based on a review from someone else, I tried what she recommended by blow drying my armpits for 5 minutes or so after applying and that REALLY helped! I highly recommend that to people as well.
customer_reviews.author: Ali

It took weeks to get my body adjusted to how it was. During the day i would sweat in different places (back, arms) which wAs worse than just light sweating in the underarms.
customer_reviews.author: Mikaela

customer_reviews.title: Swamp pits with chemical burn
customer_reviews.text: I was so excited for this product. I am a nurse that works GeriPsych so it gets very warm, but even in the winter I sweat through my scrub top. Safe to say I will not recommend to friends and I will not be purchasing again. Waste of money.

customer_reviews.text: I didn’t use this product due to all the side effects and precautions that is written on the label. I guess I didn’t read the label close enough first. customer_reviews.author: ireland22

Now my feet are sweating instead- I guess it has to come out somewhere.

I started using this product at night and for the next few days, no sweat. My dress clothes are dry, my scrubs have no pit stains, my white coat is white, and I no longer feel self conscious in public settings vs when I have to raise my arms. This company has made a miracle product that has literally changed my life.

customer_reviews.text: I will say right off the bat that this product does indeed stop sweating. However, I could not stand the pain and through this away after the first few weeks. customer_reviews.author: Kolby N.

customer_reviews.text: I have sensitive skin. Sensitive to almost everything. This worked very well once I worked out the irritation. You can bet this will burn the first few times if you are as sensitive as I am. Use it once and wait out the burn/itch. I PROMISE it's worth it. After the burning and itching stops use it again. The burning and itching will stop I promise. And so will your sweating. This stuff really works magic if you give your skin time to get used to it. I got a script from my doctor that costs much less because of insurance or else I'd still be buying this.
customer_reviews.author: Tony Stefani

I think it's a fair trade...a few moments of discomfort is worth not having stinky, wet armpits.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

I’ve been using this product as directed for 2 weeks now, and I can honestly say this product seems to have hit the nail in the coffin. I have not had any sweat stains and I am so completely satisfied. When I put on the deodorant it stings and itches a ton, but I tough it out due to the great results.
customer_reviews.author: Loli

customer_reviews.title: WORTH IT

customer_reviews.author: Alicia R.

customer_reviews.title: Great product, Best I have found
customer_reviews.text: The first time I used this, I had chemical burns under my arms. But it works really really well and you don’t have to put it on daily. customer_reviews.title: Ouch!
customer_reviews.text: Great seller! The product stings my underarms like crazy. I forced myself to use for at least a couple weeks and followed instructions exactly. So it technically does what it's supposed to do, but the pain is pretty sharp! I can tolerate pain pretty well, but I can't fall asleep after using this and it needs to be applied at bedtime. Had to stop using.
customer_reviews.author: HK

Do not reapply two or three times because then it will be unbearable. Trust me, one coat and that’s it, you’ll be good to go :) If you suffer from hyperhidrosis like me, you’re gonna absolutely love this stuff!!!

customer_reviews.title: Great results. It worked for me.

customer_reviews.title: Do not apply to shaved areas...
customer_reviews.text: I've been using SweatBlock for a while and have had a lot of success with it, but I felt like the wipes you get don't go very far, so I decided to give this a try. It's waaaaaay too easy to over apply, to the point where it just starts running down your body. Also, be careful not to apply this to recently shaved areas. I was a bit too aggressive with my manscaping prior to application, and any areas where I used a razor almost immediately started burning and turned red.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Arnold

customer_reviews.title: Only stuff that works for me. Does cause burns, but I wash it off to avoid them.
customer_reviews.text: This is the only stuff that works for me. It takes about two dosages two nights in a row for me to be completely sweat free. 8t is true that it causes chemical burns, but there's a trick so I dont get them. I apply the product, let it dry for about 10 minutes, and when I start feeling the stinging sensation, I take a wet wash cloth and remove the product. It still works even after I wash it off. I think it's the excess that irritates my skin. I've tried Certain Dri and other products which just didnt work. This product is 15% chloride solution where certain dri is 12%. Which is why it probably didnt work.
